SEARCH
Package com.example.lotteryevent

Class CreateEventFragmentTest

java.lang.Object
com.example.lotteryevent.CreateEventFragmentTest
public class CreateEventFragmentTest extends Object
Unit tests for the validation logic within the CreateEventFragment.

This class tests the validateEventInput method to ensure all business rules for creating an event are correctly enforced. It covers scenarios such as empty fields, chronological order of dates, and the integrity of the registration period.
